title: How to Bake a Nut Cake

steps.headline: Cream the butter and add the sugar gradually.
Beat the eggs and add them to the butter mixture.
Sift the flour and baking powder and alternately with the milk.
Pour batter into two greased and floured 9-inch (23 cm) round cake pans.
Bake at 350ºF/180ºC for 25 to 30 minutes or until the cake tests done.
Turn out onto wire baking racks.
Frost as desired.
steps.description: A caramel or penuche frosting would take terrific with this cake.

text: Cream the butter and add the sugar gradually.  Beat the eggs and add them to the butter mixture.  Sift the flour and baking powder and alternately with the milk.  Fold in the chopped nuts.  Add the vanilla.  Pour batter into two greased and floured 9-inch (23 cm) round cake pans.  Bake at 350ºF/180ºC for 25 to 30 minutes or until the cake tests done.  Let cool in pans 10 minutes.  Turn out onto wire baking racks.  Frost as desired. A caramel or penuche frosting would take terrific with this cake.
